11.23.18  10:10 am   do you like kimchi

     i am not terribly familiar with it

11.23.18  9:03 am   what do you think of people imitating your style

     guess i gotta make more styles for people to immitate

11.23.18  9:00 am   Thoughts on validation?

     seems legit

11.23.18  8:50 am   Do you like The Simpsons? Any favorite episode or scene?

     the only one i recall is when sideshow bob steps on a bunch of rakes for 20 minutes

11.23.18  8:19 am   are you still chasing yourself thru hell??

     aren't we all

11.23.18  7:23 am   are you small or large

     i'd say about a medium size

11.23.18  6:14 am   why do we put people on metaphoric pedestals?

     could be a better vantage point for them

11.23.18  4:26 am   bill you haven't put in the questions for the last day are you dead

     maybe

11.23.18  2:29 am   thoughts on climate change?

     i am ok with it as long as it makes the climate better

11.23.18  1:27 am   What is your balance between orderly/experience/scheduled vs. glob/random/spontaneous?

     wavy

11.23.18  12:14 am   i am finding it rea`lly hard to enjoy the note G#, do you know any good songs in G#?

     i want you back (jackson 5), celebrate (kool and the gang). these are chosen particularly because they both seem to be in celebration of the note you mentioned

11.22.18  11:38 pm   i always curious on what's happening on you website, through out the years, are you going to change your website layout or add more links?

     i always have


(i like your font)


     the font you are seeing is yours, not mine

11.22.18  11:27 pm   Would you mind giving me life advice?

     sure, i don't know which life you have but i will take a guess and give you the corresponding advice which is yes i think you should do it

11.22.18  10:19 pm   Why were there no songs in 2012?

     was writing them the entire time

11.22.18  10:16 pm   Do you naturally weird, or you become weird just because you want to be noticed?

     being weird does not get you noticed unless you do it out loud

11.22.18  10:01 pm   how many sunflower seeds can i eat before i have eaten too many sunflower seeds?

     11

11.22.18  8:16 pm   what shape is mars?

     flat

11.22.18  8:11 pm   What's the most cool thing about 124th street? 

     singability

11.22.18  8:01 pm   For your latest few songs, have you been strictly creating the song before the video, or are you sort of creating them together?

     song first

11.22.18  7:51 pm   how do you mentally calcuate how many weeks until a certain date

      it's about 4.3 weeks per month

11.22.18  6:53 pm   what mind altering substances do you use

     lunch

11.22.18  5:55 pm   why did you make movies and songs many years before you made a youtube account?

     why did you learn to read and write many years before asking me this question

11.22.18  5:13 pm   what say you we bring be the letter þ?

     where

11.22.18  4:58 pm   once you accumulate 100 questions asking if your music has deep hidden meanings in it do you get a 1-up 

     it's a 1-up every time, but it's been way more than 100

11.22.18  4:47 pm   why not relate the intro of slow down to the rest of the song by some kind of rhythmic relation?

     doesn't seem necessary

11.22.18  2:38 pm   Did you write another new song for the next release?

     yes, except i've had the first line since september

How is it going?

     good

Anything you can tell us about the vibe or style? 

     holiday

11.22.18  2:11 pm   do you do the lyrics or the music first?

     together

11.22.18  12:10 pm   can I bobble down 125th street?

     sure

11.22.18  12:00 pm   what was it like at the beginning of your journey, when you had a tiny audience compared to today?

     confusing, and it still is

you never stopped producing content. did the numbers ever affect your productivity or your drive to create more content? 

      no

11.22.18  11:15 am   Why do we notate "B flat" like Bb and not like bB like how incidentals are written before a note on staff paper?

     i don't know

11.22.18  11:15 am   How does one attain clear skin?

     i have no idea

11.22.18  10:31 am   hi bill! in one of my classes we need to analyze a song, and i decided to do your "long long journey". although it's a new one, its certainly one of my favorites. could you tell us something we may not know about it/the process of making it?  

     i re wrote the ending at least 3 times

11.22.18  9:56 am   do you have any free time 

     no

11.22.18  9:49 am   How many instruments did your songs contain before you implemented the 2-week schedule

     58

and how many do you use now?

     57

11.22.18  6:27 am   Why does change suck?

     if things were good already

11.22.18  4:12 am   how did you become free one day, after being not free for so long

     been free and not free the entire time

11.22.18  2:12 am   everyone says I should start with small ideas I don't care about to get practice for the big ideas I do care about, but I don't want to do that! I want to do the big fun idea now! but now I feel like I can't do that because I'm all scared it won't turn out good because of people telling me to start small... what do I do?

     find some small ideas you do care about. and, for a twist, try working on a big idea you don't care about, to see how that feels

11.22.18  12:23 am   when you say you're going to rehab for things like singing about going home and how you'll do it less are you changing your songs because you think it will sound stronger or because of what other people think?

     both

11.22.18  12:13 am   If you could tell the people on this page one thing, what would it be?

     you can ask a question by typing it in the box

11.22.18  12:06 am   What's the nicest thing I can do for myself

     send a nice messsge

     get some new memories!

     red and blue are sufficient contrast, and they are possibly less strange looking
